CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Parkershire Burger?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Parkershire Burger is arc {World Donuts}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Parkershire Burger?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Parkershire Burger is arc {Martinberg Hot Dog}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Martinberg Hot Dog} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Parkershire Burger} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from World Donuts to Martinberg Hot Dog in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Martinberg Hot Dog to World Donuts in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between World Donuts and Martinberg Hot Dog in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between World Donuts and Martinberg Hot Dog is {299}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Christopher's Tacos and Parkershire Burger in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Christopher's Tacos and Parkershire Burger is {149}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Martinberg Hot Dog?
SC.A: The total flow output from Martinberg Hot Dog is {770}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Christopher's Tacos?
SC.A: The total flow input by Christopher's Tacos is {546}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 417? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {511} from {Martinberg Hot Dog} to {Parkershire Burger}, a flow of {438} from {Parkershire Burger} to {Martinberg Hot Dog}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 170? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {149} from {Parkershire Burger} to {Christopher's Tacos}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 279 and 316? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {299} from {World Donuts} to {Martinberg Hot Dog}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Christopher's Tacos to Parkershire Burger or from Christopher's Tacos to World Donuts?
NC.A: The flow from {Christopher's Tacos} to {World Donuts} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Parkershire Burger to Christopher's Tacos, from Martinberg Hot Dog to Parkershire Burger, or from Martinberg Hot Dog to World Donuts?
NC.A: The flow from {Martinberg Hot Dog} to {Parkershire Burger} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {World Donuts}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Martinberg Hot Dog} and {Parkershire Burger}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Martinberg Hot Dog, Arc Parkershire Burger, Arc World Donuts, Arc Christopher's Tacos}.
